languages.text: "Однако есть прискорбный нюанс. На твоем пути возник Аребенниан — один из племени Цегораха, что скрывается в переплетениях Паутины. Иначе их зовут Арлекинами, и тот, что появился на Обсидиановом суде — самый опасный и непредсказуемый. Я начинаю думать, что его визит — знак того, что в происходящие с нами события вмешались со стороны. Возможно... с самого высокого дозволения".

traits.locale_text: "Однако есть нюанс. на твоем пути возник Аребенниан — один из племени Цегораха, что скрывается в переплетениях Паутины. Иначе их зовут Арлекинами, и тот, что появился на Обсидиановом суде — самый опасный и непредсказуемый. Я начинаю думать, что его визит — знак того, что в происходящие с нами события вмешались со стороны. И одна мысль о том, что направляет нас, заставляет мою кровь холодеть".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "But there is one unfortunate detail. An Arebennian has stepped into your path — one of Cegorach's tribe, who lurk in the tangle of the Webway. I have heard them called Harlequins in your tongue. The one that appeared in the Obsidian Court is the most dangerous and unpredictable of all. I am beginning to think that his visit is a sign that the events unfolding around us have not been left to chance. Perhaps they are the result of interference... at the behest of the highest authority."
languages.original_text: "Однако есть прискорбный нюанс. На твоем пути возник Аребенниан — один из племени Цегораха, что скрывается в переплетениях Паутины. Иначе их зовут Арлекинами, и тот, что появился на Обсидиановом суде — самый опасный и непредсказуемый. Я начинаю думать, что его визит — знак того, что в происходящие с нами события вмешались со стороны. Возможно... с самого высокого дозволения".

traits.locale_text: "But there is one unfortunate detail. An Arebennian has stepped into your path — one of Cegorach's tribe, who lurk in the tangle of the Webway. They are also known as Harlequins, and the one that appeared in the Obsidian Court is the most dangerous and unpredictable of all. I am beginning to think that his visit is a sign — a sign that the events unfolding around us have not been left to chance. Perhaps they are the result of interference... at the behest of the highest authority."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But there is one unfortunate detail. An Arebennian has stepped into your path — one of Cegorach's tribe, who lurk in the tangle of the Webway. They are also known as Harlequins, and the one that appeared in the Obsidian Court is the most dangerous and unpredictable of all. I am beginning to think that his visit is a sign — a sign that the events unfolding around us have not been left to chance. Perhaps they are the result of interference... at the behest of the highest authority."

traits.locale_text: "But there is one unfortunate detail. An Arebennian has stepped into your path — one of Cegorach's tribe, who lurk in the tangle of the Webway. They are also known as Harlequins, and the one that appeared in the Obsidian Court is the most dangerous and unpredictable of all. I am beginning to think that his visit is a sign — a sign that the events unfolding around us have not been left to chance. Perhaps they are the result of interference... at the behest of the highest authority."

traits.locale_text: "But there is one unfortunate detail. An Arebennian has stepped into your path — one of Cegorach's tribe, who lurk in the tangle of the Webway. I have heard them called Harlequins in your tongue. The one that appeared in the Obsidian Court is the most dangerous and unpredictable of all. I am beginning to think that his visit is a sign that the events unfolding around us have not been left to chance. Perhaps they are the result of interference... at the behest of the highest authority."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Sin embargo, hay un detalle especialmente lamentable. Tu camino se cruza con el de un Arebennian, un miembro de la tribu de Cegorach que acecha en la Telaraña. Creo que en vuestra lengua los llamáis Arlequines. El que apareció en la Corte de Obsidiana es el más peligroso e impredecible de todos. Empiezo a pensar que su visita es una clara señal de que todo lo que sucede a nuestro alrededor no es coincidencia. De que alguien lo ha preparado... por orden de las máximas autoridades».
languages.original_text: "But there is one unfortunate detail. An Arebennian has stepped into your path — one of Cegorach's tribe, who lurk in the tangle of the Webway. I have heard them called Harlequins in your tongue. The one that appeared in the Obsidian Court is the most dangerous and unpredictable of all. I am beginning to think that his visit is a sign that the events unfolding around us have not been left to chance. Perhaps they are the result of interference... at the behest of the highest authority."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, hay un detalle especialmente lamentable. Tu camino se cruza con el de un Arebennian, un miembro de la tribu de Cegorach que acecha en la Telaraña. Creo que en vuestra lengua los llamáis Arlequines. El que apareció en la Corte de Obsidiana es el más peligroso e impredecible de todos. Empiezo a pensar que su visita es una clara señal de que todo lo que sucede a nuestro alrededor no es coincidencia. De que alguien lo ha preparado... por orden de las máximas autoridades».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “但这里有个糟糕的细节。有位独角出现在了你的道路上，这些人效忠于乔高奇，潜伏在错综复杂的网道之中。我听说你们会称他们为‘丑角’。出现在黑曜王庭的那位独角极其危险，无法预测。他的到来不禁让我怀疑，我们身边发生的所有的事情绝非偶然。或许这些事情是……某种至高意志干预之下的结果。”
languages.original_text: "But there is one unfortunate detail. An Arebennian has stepped into your path — one of Cegorach's tribe, who lurk in the tangle of the Webway. I have heard them called Harlequins in your tongue. The one that appeared in the Obsidian Court is the most dangerous and unpredictable of all. I am beginning to think that his visit is a sign that the events unfolding around us have not been left to chance. Perhaps they are the result of interference... at the behest of the highest authority."

traits.locale_text: “但这里有个糟糕的细节。有位独角出现在了你的道路上，这些人效忠于乔高奇，潜伏在错综复杂的网道之中。我听说你们会称他们为‘丑角’。出现在黑曜王庭的那位独角极其危险，无法预测。他的到来不禁让我怀疑，我们身边发生的所有的事情绝非偶然。或许这些事情是……某种至高意志干预之下的结果。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「だが、残念な点がひとつある。アーベニアンがお前の道を阻んでいる…網辻に潜む、セゴラックの部族のひとりだ。お前の言語でハーレクィンと呼ばれていたな。オブシディアの法廷に現れたあいつは、何よりも危険で何をするか分からないやつだ。やつが現れたことで、我々の周りで起きている出来事は偶然によるものではなかったのではないかと思い始めた。おそらく干渉によってもたらされた結果なのだろう…最高権威者の命令による」
languages.original_text: "But there is one unfortunate detail. An Arebennian has stepped into your path — one of Cegorach's tribe, who lurk in the tangle of the Webway. I have heard them called Harlequins in your tongue. The one that appeared in the Obsidian Court is the most dangerous and unpredictable of all. I am beginning to think that his visit is a sign that the events unfolding around us have not been left to chance. Perhaps they are the result of interference... at the behest of the highest authority."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、残念な点がひとつある。アーベニアンがお前の道を阻んでいる…網辻に潜む、セゴラックの部族のひとりだ。お前の言語でハーレクィンと呼ばれていたな。オブシディアの法廷に現れたあいつは、何よりも危険で何をするか分からないやつだ。やつが現れたことで、我々の周りで起きている出来事は偶然によるものではなかったのではないかと思い始めた。おそらく干渉によってもたらされた結果なのだろう…最高権威者の命令による」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Le problème, c'est cet Arebennian qui s'est mis en travers de votre chemin. Il appartient à la clique de Cegorach, qui rôde dans le dédale de la Toile. Sauf erreur de ma part, on les appelle Arlequins, dans votre langue. Celui qui est apparu à la Cour d'Obsidienne est le plus dangereux et imprévisible de tous. Je commence à croire que sa visite est un signe et que ce qui nous est arrivé dernièrement n'est pas le fruit du hasard, mais le résultat d'une machination... ourdie par les plus hautes instances. »
languages.original_text: "But there is one unfortunate detail. An Arebennian has stepped into your path — one of Cegorach's tribe, who lurk in the tangle of the Webway. I have heard them called Harlequins in your tongue. The one that appeared in the Obsidian Court is the most dangerous and unpredictable of all. I am beginning to think that his visit is a sign that the events unfolding around us have not been left to chance. Perhaps they are the result of interference... at the behest of the highest authority."

traits.locale_text: « Le problème, c'est cet Arebennian qui s'est mis en travers de votre chemin. Il appartient à la clique de Cegorach, qui rôde dans le dédale de la Toile. Sauf erreur de ma part, on les appelle Arlequins, dans votre langue. Celui qui est apparu à la Cour d'Obsidienne est le plus dangereux et imprévisible de tous. Je commence à croire que sa visite est un signe et que ce qui nous est arrivé dernièrement n'est pas le fruit du hasard, mais le résultat d'une machination... ourdie par les plus hautes instances. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Doch es gibt ein bedauerliches Detail. Ein Arebennian ist in Euren Weg getreten — einer von Cegorachs Stamm, die im Gewirr des Netzes der Tausend Tore lauern. In Eurer Sprache nennt man sie Harlekine. Und jener, der vor dem Obsidiangericht aufgetaucht ist, ist der gefährlichste und unberechenbarste von allen. Ich glaube langsam, dass sein Besuch ein Zeichen ist, dass die Ereignisse, die sich um uns herum entfalten, kein Zufall sind. Vielleicht sind sie das Ergebnis von Interferenz ... auf Geheiß der höchsten Autorität."
languages.original_text: "But there is one unfortunate detail. An Arebennian has stepped into your path — one of Cegorach's tribe, who lurk in the tangle of the Webway. I have heard them called Harlequins in your tongue. The one that appeared in the Obsidian Court is the most dangerous and unpredictable of all. I am beginning to think that his visit is a sign that the events unfolding around us have not been left to chance. Perhaps they are the result of interference... at the behest of the highest authority."

traits.locale_text: "Doch es gibt ein bedauerliches Detail. Ein Arebennian ist in Euren Weg getreten — einer von Cegorachs Stamm, die im Gewirr des Netzes der Tausend Tore lauern. In Eurer Sprache nennt man sie Harlekine. Und jener, der vor dem Obsidiangericht aufgetaucht ist, ist der gefährlichste und unberechenbarste von allen. Ich glaube langsam, dass sein Besuch ein Zeichen ist, dass die Ereignisse, die sich um uns herum entfalten, kein Zufall sind. Vielleicht sind sie das Ergebnis von Interferenz ... auf Geheiß der höchsten Autorität."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "But there is one unfortunate detail. An Arebennian has stepped into your path — one of Cegorach's tribe, who lurk in the tangle of the Webway. I have heard them called Harlequins in your tongue. The one that appeared in the Obsidian Court is the most dangerous and unpredictable of all. I am beginning to think that his visit is a sign that the events unfolding around us have not been left to chance. Perhaps they are the result of interference... at the behest of the highest authority."

languages.text: "Ancak şöyle talihsiz bir pürüz var. Yoluna bir Arebennian çıktı... Ağyol'un düğümlerinde dolaşan Cegorach'ın kabilesinden. Sizin dilinizde Arleken deniyormuş galiba. O Obsidiyen Divan'da gördüğün; en tehlikelisidir, sağı solu hiç belli olmaz. Bu başımıza gelenlerin hiçbirinin şans eseri olmadığını düşünmeye başlıyorum. Belki de en tepedekilerin müdahalesiyle... Böyle sonuçlar doğdu."
languages.original_text: "But there is one unfortunate detail. An Arebennian has stepped into your path — one of Cegorach's tribe, who lurk in the tangle of the Webway. I have heard them called Harlequins in your tongue. The one that appeared in the Obsidian Court is the most dangerous and unpredictable of all. I am beginning to think that his visit is a sign that the events unfolding around us have not been left to chance. Perhaps they are the result of interference... at the behest of the highest authority."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak şöyle talihsiz bir pürüz var. Yoluna bir Arebennian çıktı... Ağyol'da dolaşan Cegorach'ın kabilesinden. Sizin dilinizde Arleken deniyormuş galiba. O Obsidiyen Divan'da gördüğün; en tehlikelisidir, sağı solu hiç belli olmaz. Bu başımıza gelenlerin hiçbiri şans eseri olmadı, diye düşünmeye başlıyorum. Belki de en tepedekilerin bir müdahalesiyle... Bu tarz sonuçlar doğdu."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
